org.vast.ows

Class AbstractRequestWriter<RequestType extends OWSRequest>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vast.ows.AbstractRequestWriter<RequestType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OWSRequestWriter<RequestType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DescribeCoverageWriterV11, DescribeProcessRequestWriter, DescribeProcessWriter, DescribeSensorWriterV20, ExecuteProcessRequestWriter, GetCapabilitiesWriter, GetCoverageWriterV11, GetMapWriterV10, GetMapWriterV11, RegisterWriterV10, SASGetCapabilitiesWriter, SASSubscribeWriter, SWERequestWriter, UnregisterWriterV10, WCSTransactionWriterV11, WRSRequestWriter

    public abstract class AbstractRequestWriter<RequestType extends OWSRequest>
extends Object
implements OWSRequestWriter<RequestType>

    Base abstract class for all service specific POST/GET request builders

    Since:
    Oct 30, 2005 * @param Type of OWS request object accepted by this writer
    Author:
    Alex Robin

      • writeBboxArgument

                     Bbox bbox,
                     boolean writeCrs)
        Utility method to add bbox with CRS argument to a GET request.
        Format is minY,minX,maxY,maxX[,crsUri]
        Parameters:
        buffer - string buffer to append to
        bbox - Bbox object to be serialized
        writeCrs - true if crs URI should be appended at the end of the string
